name: Run build configuration as generated user
description: Super-admin creates new user, new user creates project, project build configuration and runs it

steps.name: Create test user with fake user-data, generate fake project data

Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/users with data: {'username': 'special', 'password': 'robuuCIjBCv', 'email': 'johnsonemily@example.org', 'roles': {'role': [{'roleId': 'PROJECT_ADMIN', 'scope': 'g'}]}}, expected_status: 200
Auth user with creds: "('special', 'robuuCIjBCv')" and get csrf token
Sending GET request to http://localhost:8111/authenticationTest.html?csrf with data: None, expected_status: 200
Send request to create new project

Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/projects with data: {'parentProject': {'locator': '_Root'}, 'name': 'story', 'id': 'NSwnN6Lbn9K', 'copyAllAssociatedSettings': True}, expected_status: 200
Check if generated fake project ID: "NSwnN6Lbn9K" equals ID from respond "NSwnN6Lbn9K"
Create build conf for created project NSwnN6Lbn9K

Create build configuration with data: {'id': 'PZM7XCYqb0I', 'name': 'head', 'project': {'id': 'NSwnN6Lbn9K'}, 'steps': {'name': 'remain', 'type': 'leave', 'properties': {'property': [{'name': 'script.content', 'value': "echo 'Hello World!'"}, {'name': 'teamcity.step.mode', 'value': 'default'}, {'name': 'use.custom.script', 'value': 'true'}]}}}

Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/buildTypes with data: {'id': 'PZM7XCYqb0I', 'name': 'head', 'project': {'id': 'NSwnN6Lbn9K'}, 'steps': {'name': 'remain', 'type': 'leave', 'properties': {'property': [{'name': 'script.content', 'value': "echo 'Hello World!'"}, {'name': 'teamcity.step.mode', 'value': 'default'}, {'name': 'use.custom.script', 'value': 'true'}]}}}, expected_status: 200
Check if created fake build conf ID: "PZM7XCYqb0I" equals ID from respond "PZM7XCYqb0I"
Test run created project build configuration with id: PZM7XCYqb0I
Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/buildQueue with data: {'buildType': {'id': 'PZM7XCYqb0I'}}, expected_status: 200
Verify that build with create fake id: "PZM7XCYqb0I" equals to build conf that was launched: "PZM7XCYqb0I"

labels.name: story
labels.value: As project admin run build configuration
